The expert: s verdict mentions that the VA Blue Button primarily allows veterans to access self-entered health metrics, emergency contact information, test results, family health history, military health history, and other health-related information. This aspect further supports the IAVA's statement that veterans can only download certain types of medical information, rather than their complete electronic medical records.
The IAVA: s founder and executive director, Paul Rieckhoff, states that the only thing a veteran can download from the VA's system are pharmaceutical records and personal health information that they have self-entered. This statement provides evidence contradicting President Obama's claim and adds to the verification process.
